attributes.action: Insist that all legal titles be included on the drop down menu of online forms!
attributes.background: Most drop down menus ignore the hard earned legal titles you and I have the privilege to own. Reduced to Mr Miss Ms and Dr, what happened to all the military and church and academic titles on the list? Some manage. Why can't all? What's so special about 'Doctor'? Mine's Revd. What's yours?

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for different organisations.
